Manhwas.name: ✨ Elissa's Whirlwind Marriage 🏅
Manhwas.description: After marrying the villain who will kill her in the future, Elissa decides to be kind to him in order to change her fate.

Manhwas.name: ✨ Evolution Frenzy 🏅
Manhwas.description: In an apocalyptic world, Duan Fei, who lost everything, dies. But he didn't expect that he would return to the beginning of everything.

Manhwas.name: ✨ Father, I Don't Want This Marriage 🎖️🏅
Manhwas.alternativeName: Pai Eu Não Quero Me Casar
Manhwas.description: After being accused of killing the princess and left to die by her father, Jubelian is reincarnated and decides to change her destiny.

Manhwas.name: ✨ Heavenly Demon Instructor 🏅
Manhwas.description: In a world where humanity is fighting against monsters, Hyunsoo is a powerless young man. But that changes when he meets a master, with divine powers, who is invisible to others.

Manhwas.name: ✨ I Am The Sorcerer King 🎖️🏅
Manhwas.description: Monsters began to appear and attack humanity. Lee SungHoon regained the memories of his past life where he was a great sorcerer.

Manhwas.name: ✨ I Became The Wife Of The Male Lead 🎖️🏅
Manhwas.alternativeName: Me Tornei A Esposa Do Protagonista Masculino
Manhwas.description: After being reincarnated as Fiona, the main villain of a novel she wrote, and destined to die in the end, she decides to change her future.

Manhwas.name: ✨ I Thought It’s A Common Possession 🏅
Manhwas.alternativeName: Eu Achei Que Fosse Uma Transmigração Comum
Manhwas.description: After being reincarnated as Edith, the villain of a story destined to die in the end, she decides to change her future. This leads to a series of changes in the work.

Manhwas.name: ✨ I Want To Become The Emperor, So I Need A Divorce 🏅
Manhwas.alternativeName: Quero Me Tornar A Imperatriz, Então Preciso De Um Divórcio
Manhwas.description: After marrying the king of a small kingdom for political reasons, Arnoah must find a way to divorce her husband so that he does not inherit the title of Emperor.

Manhwas.name: ✨ Knight Of The Frozen Flower 🏅
Manhwas.description: After being killed by the man she loved, Julia Von Rosenthal has the chance to start all over again. But this time, she will live for herself.

Manhwas.name: ✨ Marriage Of Convenience 🎖️🏅
Manhwas.description: Bianca is a countess who, at her death, regrets her selfish life and is given a second chance. Upon turning 19, she decides to change her future, starting with her relationship with her husband, Count Zachary de Arno.

Manhwas.name: ✨ The Heroine Had An Affair With My Fiance 🎖️🏅
Manhwas.alternativeName: A Heroína Teve Um Caso Com Meu Noivo
Manhwas.description: After being betrayed by her fiancé and the heroine, Ciella Labyrinth ends the engagement and decides to venture into a relationship with the prince.

Manhwas.name: ✨ The Story Of A Low-Rank Soldier Becoming A Monarch
✨ Who Made Me A Princess 🏆🥈🎖️🏅
Manhwas.description: After being reincarnated as Athanasia, princess of an empire from a book, she discovers that her destiny is to be killed by her own father, Emperor Claude, when she turns 18.
